characterDescription:
The citylord of Hornhollow is a lighteyed man.
He gestures eagerly for Kaladin to take the spheres he's being offered, yet seems disappointed when Kaladin doesn't exchange two of his dun spheres for every infused sphere.
Still, he asks Kaladin if he'd like to see the location of the attack by rogue parshmen and Kaladin readily agrees that he would.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is portly and wears a long raincloak and a wide-brimmed hat.
